title: Newly Renovated! Stainless Steel Appliances, 5 Mins From BART, FWY
posting_body: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live.
We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach.
Where you live, is where you come alive.
In an area flourishing with convenience, culture, and possibility, Avalon San Bruno offers spacious 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom apartments and townhomes for lease in San Mateo County.
Imagine entertaining in modern kitchens with granite countertops, hard surface flooring, and private balconies and patios, and select apartments feature newly renovated finishes.
Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living.
Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include a state-of-the-art fitness center with flex studio, swimming pool, and courtyards with grilling stations throughout.

Our community is conveniently located within walking distance to the BART and Cal Train stations, where you can easily commute to Silicon Valley or San Francisco, as well as fine shopping and dining at the Shops at Tanforan.
This is not just apartment living.
Apartment homes include features for persons with disabilities required by the Federal Fair Housing Act.
